channel.title: DEADMAN MODE - Mocroscape
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][font=courier][i]MocroScape [/i][/font][/size][/center] [center][url=http://mocro.net/forum]mocro.net/forum[/url][/center] [center] Looking for a fresh unique gaming experience? Support Mocroscape We need your help! Mocroscape will be a server that will be known and will be loved for its innovativeness, we have enough boring servers. Time for some real fun. We are not scared to expand our boundaries. Come with ideas/suggestions, if it works we'll make it work. The community makes the server and we need every single one of your help to make this a succesful server. So every help is welcome, all the feedback positive or negative is appreciated. Frequent updates. Give us a chance and please be patient with us.
Featuring:
NO 13 year old mods ALMOST ALL AGILITY SHORTCUTS FIXED! WHEN YOUR STUNNED OR FROZEN YOU CANT USE SHORTCUT. F SHORTKEYS!(F1-F9) Starteritem 1 per computer starteritem 5 per ip you cannot trade yourself you cannot fight yourself Muiling is not aloud!
3 SECOND DELAY FOR NON SKULL 10 SECOND DELAY FOR SKULL
Protect 2 combat skills. All skiller skills are protected.
IN COMBAT DROPPING NOT ALOUD!
Custom Skilling Pets:
-Woodcutting -Smithing -Firemaking -Cooking -Herblore -Prayer
Custom Npc Drop pets:
Dwarf Imp Blue dragon Rock Crab Black dragon More to come!
Kill Death Counter. Clue scroll counter. Santa Event x50 Exp Rate Target Training for combat and range. Protect skills at nurse Sarah safe Deposit box is at Niles. Rules that will be changed upon time, example: if clans will become a problem we will do something about it. Using Database for all players info! Auto Backup every day! You can hold up 4 Keys. when skulled and more then 2 keys announcement will be made.[/center]
Check out MocroScape today at [url=http://mocro.net]mocro.net[/url]

item.title: DEADMAN MODE - Mocroscape
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Soulcist:

And as far as fighting and trading yourself, are you talking about mutli-logging? I’m assuming that’s what, “muiling” means because I’ve never heard of such a word; could be wrong on that one.

I think it was a typo for muling, where you store your valuable items on a separate account and just transfer them over to your main account when you need them. That way, if you die you still have backup items.

Read full topic

item.title: DEADMAN MODE - Mocroscape
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“sonisFTW, post:1, topic:554238”]Featuring:

NO 13 year old mods
ALMOST ALL AGILITY SHORTCUTS FIXED!
WHEN YOUR STUNNED OR FROZEN YOU CANT USE SHORTCUT.
F SHORTKEYS!(F1-F9)
Starteritem 1 per computer
starteritem 5 per ip
you cannot trade yourself
you cannot fight yourself
Muiling is not aloud![/quote]

You have some interesting “features” list, I must admit. I’m a strong believer that in some people, their age doesn’t matter and the maturity of that person can very well be different from that of a 21 year old (for example), and even a little more mature than that 21 year old. It shouldn’t be apart of your feature list, that’s a little ridiculous.

And as far as fighting and trading yourself, are you talking about mutli-logging? I’m assuming that’s what, “muiling” means because I’ve never heard of such a word; could be wrong on that one.

Anyway, a little bit of media and an more interesting feature list would do this thread some good. Good luck with the server!

Read full topic
